Method Detail

getFile

String getFile()
Get the scanned file name. This may be any string, if not scanning from a real file.

Returns:
Return file name string.

close

void close()
           throws IOException
Close the scanned input.

Throws:
IOException - On IO errors.

hasNextToken

boolean hasNextToken()
Return true if the scanner has more tokens.

Returns:
Return true if ther are more tokens.

nextToken

void nextToken()
               throws SyntaxException,
                      IOException
Let the scanner scans the next token.

Throws:
SyntaxException - On syntax errors.
IOException - On IO errors.

peekToken

Token peekToken()
                throws SyntaxException,
                       IOException
Peeks one token w/o advancing current token.

Returns:
Return peeked token.
Throws:
SyntaxException - On syntax errors.
IOException - On IO errors.

getCurrentToken

Token getCurrentToken()
Get the current scanned token.

Returns:
Return current token object.

backtrackToken

Token backtrackToken()
Backtrack current token one token. TODO: Return void.

Returns:
Return token.

backtrackToken

Token backtrackToken(int count)
Backtrack current token n token. TODO: Return void.

Parameters:
count - How many tokens to back track.
Returns:
Return token.
